title: Perry Bamonte, a Guitarist from The Cure, Passes Away
summary: Perry Bamonte, who played guitar and keyboard for the band The Cure, has died at age 65. The band shared this sad news on their website, saying he died after a short illness at home during Christmas. They called him a creative and important part of their story. Bamonte started working with The Cure in 1984 and joined the band in 1990. He played on five albums with songs like Friday I'm In Love. He performed in over 400 shows and later played bass in another band. In 2022, he rejoined The Cure and played with them until 2024. The Cure is a famous band that started in 1976 and has influenced many types of music. Bamonte also liked fly fishing and worked as an illustrator for a magazine.
